name: Call of Duty: Zombies: Therapy
description:
The classic crew of Call of Duty: Zombies are coming face-to-face with their greatest enemy yet: Therapy. As Doctor Therapist you try to bring a harmony to the lives of Richtofen, Dempsey, Takeo, and Nikolai while they stubbornly refuse to apologize for their zombie-killing antics. Can you get through to them?

Content Warning: Strong Language, References to Violence and Killing
